attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im studying for a well paid career and about to do my exams, my partner does have a very well paid career and we still can not afford a 90% morgage. i have heard there are deals for 1st time buyers..but do they exist and are all morgage lenders aware of this deal. we have a young child and want a 3 bedroomed property with a garden and in a good school catchment area but saving up £15,000-£20,000 is impossible. i demand a 95% morgage for 1st time buyers to get on the property market, lenders discriminate against first time buyers and this is unacceptable.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
